title: Ep. 133: Interview With Noah Hawley of 'Legion' and 'Fargo'
description:
The RInger's Andy Greenwald sits down with Noah Hawley, the showrunner and creator of FX's 'Legion' and 'Fargo,' to talk about last night's episode of 'Legion' (6:00) as well as the creative process of the show (11:30) and his upcoming projects (43:45).
      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
